official_title: A concurrent resolution calling for support for the assertion by the United States of the legitimate right of self defense against hostile attacks by Libya in international waters.

summary.text: Declares that the Congress supports U.S. actions taken against Libya and U.S. assertion of the right of transit in international waters.
